msContents.summary: This is a multiple-text manuscript containing two complete texts and three fragments: first, on the second guard folio, an unknown vyākaraṇa commentary containing a discussion of the Śivasūtras a.k.a. akṣarasamāmnāya; the Nikṣeparakṣā of Vedāntadeśika; the Gṛhārcāpratiṣṭhāvidhi within the Pāñcarātrika Varāhasaṃhitā; and, on the two back guard folios, a line and a half of what appears to be a variant of a passage in the Rāmāyaṇa Bālakāṇḍa (beginning at 28.1cd in the Critical Edition), and a fragment that appears to be from the 43rd and 44th chapters of the longer recension of the Śrīraṅgamāhātmya. Badly broken condition.

msItem.title: Unknown commentary on akṣarasamāmnāya
msItem.incipit:
nanu caturdaśasūtryām akṣarasamāmnāyād atra vyavahārān upapattiḥ
maheśvaraprasādalabdhānītiphalitaṃ evañ caivam ānupūrvikā śrutir evaiṣā ta
msItem.explicit: sarvavedapāra iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākaraṇam upaka veda iche vyetam apa

msItem.title: Nikṣeparakṣā
msItem.author: Vedāntdeśika
msItem.incipit:
saṃsārādhvagatāgataśramaharas sarvāvagāhyaḥ svayaṃ śrīsaṃśleṣasamullasadghanarasaś śītas taṭāko mahān | nediṣṭhena mahāpathena sugamo yeṣāṃ prasā
dād abhūt tīrtthan tatra śubhaṃ prakāśayatu nas tebhyo gurubhyo namaḥ | prāyaḥ prapadane puṃsāṃ paunaḥpunyaṃ nivārayan hastaḥ śrīraṃgabhartur mām avyādabhayamudritam |
msItem.explicit:
vivṛtam iha
rahasyaṃ yan mayā gopanīyyaṃ skhalitam api yad īṣat bhrayasā vā tad etat | nijamahimaviśeṣapremamātreṇa nāthaḥ kṣamata iti vicintya kṣantum arhanti santaḥ | — gurucaraṇasapa
ryyāsvādavaideśikānāṃ pralapitam avadhūya prāktanainādhvanaiva | vyavṛṇuta paramārtthaṃ veṃkaṭeśaḥ prajānāṃ nigamagirinigūḍhaṃ nyāsavidyānidhānaṃ | —
msItem.finalRubric:
iti kavitā
rkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṃkaṭanāthasya mama nāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiḥ nikṣeparakṣā samāptā |

msItem.title: Varāhasaṃhitā Gṛhārcāpratiṣṭhāvidhi
msItem.incipit: gṛhe pratiṣṭhāṃ vakṣyāmi māsāṃ deva sāṃprataṃ navabhāgagrahaṃ kṛtvā samyaksūtreṇa lāñchayet |
msItem.explicit:
jñānayajñena deveśan tatraivaṃ yajate naraḥ |
sāyujyaṃ labhate vipraḥ sarvadā nanātra saṃśayaḥ |
msItem.finalRubric:
iti śrīpāñcarātre mahopaniṣadi varāhasaṃhitāyāṃ gṛhārccā
pratiṣṭhā nāma pañcadaśodhyāyaḥ |
msItem.colophon: hariḥ om śubham astu śrīgurūbhyo namaḥ śrīmadvedāntagurave namaḥ

msItem.title: Śrīraṅgamāhātmya
msItem.incipit:
kraṃ vinā kvacit kiñcit vidhir eṣaḥ pravarttakaḥ | sa eṣa sarvaṃ jānāti vedavidyaḥ paraḥ pumān | mahāvyatikramas tasa | ga xxeṇa kutaḥ kila
ṇe śrīraṃgamāhātmye tricatvāriṃśodhyāyaḥ | vyāsama | i x śrutvā vi?ye xākyaṃ papra x śivasanti?yaṃ ||
msItem.explicit: tra kāryam ajānatā | śrūyatāñ cābhimadhāsyāmi yad atra prati ma bhāti mā | jantuś śūbhāśubhaṃ karmabhuk te svenaiva karmaṇāha gatān sarvabhutānāṃ sarvaṃ vedaśubhāśubaṃ |
